metadata.title: CVE-2014-3122 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The try_to_unmap_cluster function in mm/rmap.c in the Linux kernel before3.14.3 does not properly consider which pages must be locked, which allowslocal users to cause a denial of service (system crash) by triggering amemory-usage pattern that requires removal of page-table mappings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
